Ghostly Bane.name: Ghostly Bane
Ghostly Bane.flavor: You fade slightly from the world, dragging a tendril of your enemyâ€™s soul with you.
Ghostly Bane.onHit: 2d10 + Charisma modifier necrotic damage, and you become insubstantial until the end of your next turn.

Wraithform Blast.name: Wraithform Blast
Wraithform Blast.flavor: You allow yourself to slip deep into the dark, summoning a blast of soul-crushing menace against your foe.
Wraithform Blast.onHit: 4d10 + Charisma modifier psychic and necrotic damage, and ongoing 10 psychic and necrotic damage (save ends).
Wraithform Blast.effect: You become insubstantial and gain phasing. These benefits last until the end of the encounter or until you become bloodied.

Fading Spiral.name: Fading Spiral
Fading Spiral.flavor: As a spiral of dark energy slams into your attacker, you phase out of reality
Fading Spiral.effect: Use this power when your use your Darkspiral Aura. You become insubstantial until the end of your next turn.
